resources.string: Failed to find an email app

string-array.name: quick_response_defaults
string-array.item: Running just a couple of minutes late.
Go ahead and start without me.
Sorry, I can\'t make it. We\'ll have to reschedule.

resources.string: Change this and all future events
"This account is not synced, so your calendars may not be up to date. "

"Before adding an event, you must first add at least one calendar account to your phone and make a calendar visible. Tap "New account" to add an account (if you have just added an account, wait until it is synced, and then try again). Or tap Cancel and verify that at least one calendar is visible."

"Calendars work better with Google accounts. 

• Access a calendar from any web browser
• Back up your events securely"
"Edit the default responses used to reply to emails from guests"
"Use the time zone of your home"
"When enabled, calendars and event time will be displayed in accordance with the time zone of your home, even if you are traveling. "
"Event reminders will be silenced during a specified period. "
"On the same day of each month"
"This operation will access contacts on your phone. Continue? "
"When enabled, time information in a short message will be automatically recognized and saved as an agenda reminder. "
"Save the time in the latest short message on the agenda? "
"Credit card payment message received and saved on the agenda"
"Times and dates recognized in short messages will be scheduled in the Calendar. You will be issued with a reminder ahead of schedule in order that you do not miss this event. "
"Multiple time points recognized. Select a time point and then save it on the agenda. "
"You have several short messages with time information included. You can select a time. "
"Smart reminder settings for this number have been canceled three times. Would you like to add this number to the blacklist? "
"Smart reminder turned off. It can be turned back on in the Calendar. "
"Insufficient storage space available. Unable to create new events. "
"Select a team that you focus on"
"The permission to access this app is obtained. To use the app, restart it. "
"This app is not allowed to access %s. You can grant the permission in Apps under Settings. "
"Network traffic will be generated when the app is used. For the detailed costs, contact your service provider. "
"The end time can not be less than the start time, please reset it"
"The event cycle should be shorter than the repetition rate!"
Informed by messages(Only available for the participants added by Contacts.)
"Synchronize contact time information associated with calendar"
can not search weather ofthe past time,please set the system date firstly！
Unable to jump to a distant year
Add up to 100 people at most
